item.description:
THE DATE HAS CHANGED TO OCT 6, 7 WEEKEND!

FALL WORK WEEKEND! FRIDAY EVENING-SUNDAY LUNCH , OCT 5, 6, 7  "BARTER YOUR TIME AND SWEAT AND SHARE THE BOUNTY OF OUR FALL HARVEST AS YOU HELP CLOSE UP SHOP FOR THE COMING WINTER"

http://www.worldfellowship.org/ CHECK THE SITE!!!

IN A WORLD FELLOWSHIP CENTER , NH.

HELP CENTER GET READY FOR WINTER ,FOOD, BED PROVIDED, NICE COMPANY GARANTEED! RECONNECT WITH NATURE, AUTHENTIC YOU, MAKE NEW FRIENDS, GET NEW IDEAS... 

SWIM IN A LAKE..WALK/HIKE/BIKE AROUND...READ, PLAY GAMES, MUSIC...DISCUSS/DEBATE....EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO FEEL ALIVE AND WORTHY...

DIRECTORS OF THE CAMP, ANDY AND ANDREA ARE MORE THEN WELCOMING YOU TO JOIN THIS SPECIAL WORK FOR STAY AND PLAY. THEY ARE ASKING FROM YOU 4 HRS/A DAY OF VOLUNTEER, IN RETURN YOU GET A RUSTIC LODGING, AND MEALS. AND ALL THAT CENTER OFFERS POSTSEASON...PLEASE BRING YOUR OWN LINENS/SLIPPING GEAR, WATER BOTTLE, WORKING WEAR, GLOVES, WORKING SHOES, HAT, AND NICE YOURSELF.

 

ABOUT 2 HOURS FROM BOSTON!

I JUST RETURNED AND ITS ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS THERE IN MOUNTAINS!

MY CELL 781-718-6203 MAIA

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: MOUNTAINS FALL GETAWAY, ..
